In this regard, the reception endstoday- 13/12/2024. Solely applications accepted by the feedback system onon December 12 and 13will be processed.Please mind the possible increase in the processing time for the received applications to the waiting list. Please wait without sending duplicate requests.Thank you for your understanding.

id: ADDITIONAL MATERIALS FOR VISA APPLICATION||08/12/2024
title: ADDITIONAL MATERIALS FOR VISA APPLICATION
description: The Embassy of the Italian Republic conducts selective monitoring of the intended use of issued visas. Obtaining an Italian Schengen visa stipulates that the main destination country is Italy (which does not exclude transit or stay in other Schengen countries).

id: Schengen visas for citizens of the Russian Federation. Update||14/10/2024
title: Schengen visas for citizens of the Russian Federation. Update
description: Citizens of the Russian Federation can apply for a visa through the Visa Centre upon presentation of a Residence Permit or a Temporary Residence Permit in the Republic of Belarus, issuedat least 6 months before the trip to Italyand valid for at least 3 months after the applicant’s return to Belarus.

title: Changes to the package of documents for a visa

id: ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS – SESSIONS No. 7-8 - COMPLETED||10/09/2024
title: ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS – SESSIONS No. 7-8 - COMPLETED
description: We inform you that the reserve of places for manual slot assignment has been exhausted. The remaining requests were closed in the feedback system. Participants without an appointment retain their rights in the live queue, including entries in the next manual entry session.

title: RELEASE OF SLOTS – SESSION NO8 - MINSK

id: ABOUT THE MANUAL APPOINTMENTS – SESSION NO7 - MINSK||16/08/2024
title: ABOUT THE MANUAL APPOINTMENTS – SESSION NO7 - MINSK

Within the existing volume, it is planned to provide slots toMINSK for SEPTEMBER-OCTOBER 2024. There will be a separate notification for submission to BREST.

id: ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS – SESSION No. 6.2 - COMPLETED||07/31/2024
title: ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS – SESSION No. 6.2 - COMPLETED

id: REGISTRATION IN THE "LIVE QUEUE"||18/ 07/ 2024
title: REGISTRATION IN THE "LIVE QUEUE"
description:

on working days of the visa centre from 16.00 to 17.00. We remind you of the current procedure of the "Live queue":

id: CALL CENTER MAINTENANCE 15th of July 2024||12/ 07/ 2024
title: CALL CENTER MAINTENANCE 15th of July 2024
description: Due to maintenance on July 15, 2024, the call center +375 740 7409999 (mobile) / 8 740 7409999 (landline) may be unavailable. Please use the Feedback Formhttps://it.tlscontact.com/by/msq/inquiry.php. We apologize for the inconvenience!

id: ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS AND RECORDINGS – SESSION No. 6.2 - UPDATED||10/07/2024
title: ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS AND RECORDINGS – SESSION No. 6.2 - UPDATED
description: We inform you that 24 hours from the date of publication of the news expire on July 10 at 12.00 Minsk time. Requests received after this deadline will not be considered. Multiple requests from participants with numbers above 14000 are also not considered.

id: ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS– SESSION NO6.2 - MINSK||9/07/2024
title: ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS– SESSION NO6.2 - MINSK
description: Appointments at the TLScontact Visa Application Centre continue manually and are only available to first-come, first-served participants.Within 24h after publication of this news participants of the live queue can send their application for submission of documents (the subject of the appeal is "Other"). Within the available volume, it is planned to provide slots in MINSK for AUGUST-SEPTEMBER 2024:Participants from No from 1 to 7999: Standard slot.Participants From No 8000 to 14000: Prime Time slot

id: NEW APPLICATION FORM FOR SCHENGEN VISA||06/28/2024
title: NEW APPLICATION FORM FOR SCHENGEN VISA
description: From June 28, 2024, a new single application form for requesting a Schengen visa will come into force. The new form contains minor changes compared to the previous form. The form is available on the official website of the Italian Embassy in the “Forms” section, where all the necessary documents and forms for applying for a visa are also posted.https://ambminsk.esteri.it/

id: FEEDBACK FORM||06/27/2024
title: FEEDBACK FORM
description: Due to maintenance the feedback formhttps://it.tlscontact.com/by/msq/inquiry.phpmay be temporarily unavailable.Please address your questions to the call center +375 740 7409999 (mobile) / 8 740 7409999 (landline). We apologize for the inconvenience!

id: ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS– SESSION NO6 - MINSK - CANCELLATION||24/06/2024
title: ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS– SESSION NO6 - MINSK - CANCELLATION
description: During the collection of applications for manual reservation session No. 6 (06/23/2024), there were technical problems in the Feedback Form. To avoid misunderstandings with the chronology of sending, this session is canceled and applications received will be discarded. A new manual recording session will be announced soon; follow the news on the website.

id: ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS– SESSION NO6 - MINSK||19/06/2024
title: ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS– SESSION NO6 - MINSK
description:
Appointments at the TLScontact Visa Application Centre continue manually and are only available to first-come, first-served participants.
June 23, 2024 participants of the live queue can send their application for submission of documents (the subject of the appeal is "Other") from the websitehttps://it.tlscontact.com/by/msq/inquiry.phpWithin the available volume, it is planned to provide slots in MINSK for AUGUST 2024:Participants from No from 1 to 7999: Standard slot.Participants with No from 8000: Prime Time slot.

id: SCHENGEN VISA FEE||06/13/2024
title: SCHENGEN VISA FEE
description: Please note that the visa fee for citizens of the Republic of Belarus has remained unchanged since June 11, 2024.The corresponding publication is posted on the website of the Embassy of the Italian Republic in the Republic of Belarus.At the same time, the consular fee has been increased for citizens of a number of other states who have the right to submit visa documents to the Republic of Belarus.

id: RECORDING IN LIVE QUEUE – UPDATE||12/06/2024
title: RECORDING IN LIVE QUEUE – UPDATE
description: To regulate the flow of visitors during the high season and due to the large number of participants, registration for the “Live Queue” will be suspended from the date of publication of this news. The resumption of registration will be announced on the website.

id: UPDATED - ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS – SESSION No. 5||07/06/2024
title: UPDATED - ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS – SESSION No. 5
description: We report the status of processing applications during session No. 5.

id: RECORDING IN LIVE QUEUE – UPDATE||17/05/2024
title: RECORDING IN LIVE QUEUE – UPDATE
description: To regulate the flow of visitors during the high season, registration in the “Live Queue” will be carried out on business days at the visa centre only from 16.00 to 17.00, starting from 20th May 2024.

id: ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS AND RECORDING – SESSION №.5||16/05/2024
title: ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS AND RECORDING – SESSION №.5
description: Appointments at the TLScontact Visa Application Centre continue manually and are only available to participants on a first-come, first-served basis.May 18, 2024 participants of the live queue can send their application for submission (the subject of the appeal is "Other").Within the existing volume, it is planned to provide slots in MINSK and BREST for JUNE-JULY 2024:

id: UPDATED - PREMIUM SERVICE - RECEPTION AND PROCESSING||13/05/2024
title: UPDATED - PREMIUM SERVICE - RECEPTION AND PROCESSING
description: All requests for the Premium Service received within the specified period have been processed. The last number assigned in the Premium Service waiting list is No 6864. Requests for Premium Service received from 14.03.2024 will not be assigned a number. If registration resumes at the end of the summer season, news will be published on the TLScontact website.

id: LIVE QUEUE – REGISTRATION OF NON-RESIDENTS - UPDATE||24/04/2024
title: LIVE QUEUE – REGISTRATION OF NON-RESIDENTS - UPDATE
description: In addition to the news from 02/27/2024 about the “Live Queue” procedure, we inform you thatRegistration by registered mail is suspended until further notice.We will process letters sent up to and including 04/26/2024.Registration for the "Live Queue" in person upon presentation of your passport is made on business days at the visa centre from 11.00 to 12.00 and from 16.00 to 17.00.We remind you that regulating the queue is a temporary forced measure and not a service of the visa centre.

id: ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS AND BOOKING – SESSION 4 - UPDATE #2||12/04/2024
title: ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS AND BOOKING – SESSION 4 - UPDATE #2
description: We inform you that the assignment of slots in session No. 4 in Minsk and Brest has been completed due to the exhaustion of capacity. At this stage, unsatisfied requests will be closed. Please monitor further updates regarding future activities.

id: Prices for additional services||11/04/2024
title: Prices for additional services
description: Please note that prices for someadditional servicesare changing.

id: ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS AND BOOKING – SESSION 4 - ADDED||02/04/2024
title: ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS AND BOOKING – SESSION 4 - ADDED
description: Due to the fact that many requests have been received from participants in the live queue with numbers above 4000, it has been decided to provide standard slots also in the range from 4000 to 6000, until the slot reserve is exhausted.

id: ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS AND BOOKING – SESSION 4||28/03/2024
title: ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS AND BOOKING – SESSION 4
description: Until further notice, appointments at the TLScontact Visa Application Centre will continue to be made manually and will only be available to participants in the first placeOn March 29th, 2024 Participants of the live queue can send theirapplication(subject "Other")

id: UPDATE - PREMIUM SERVICE – ACCEPTANCE OF APPLICATIONS IN A CONSTANT MODE||14/03/2024
title: UPDATE - PREMIUM SERVICE – ACCEPTANCE OF APPLICATIONS IN A CONSTANT MODE
description: Due to the large number of requests received, admission ends on March 14, 2024. Requests received from March 14, 2024 will no longer be processed. Processing of the enquiries received by this time, would take ca. 1 month.

id: UPDATE - ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS – SESSION No. 3 (BREST)||14/03/2024
title: UPDATE - ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS – SESSION No. 3 (BREST)
description: Due to the large number of requests received, admission ends on March 14, 2024. Requests within available slots will be processed within 7 business days. Requests received from March 12 to March 14 for which there are not enough places remain on hold until the next amount of slots is allocated. Requests received from March 14, 2024 will no longer be processed. Participants in the live queue who have not submitted documents according to their number on the waiting list and who have not received an appointment for a slot manually retain the right to submit without prior registration.

id: ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS – SESSION No. 3 (BREST)||12/03/2024
title: ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS – SESSION No. 3 (BREST)
description: Until further notice, registration for application at the TLScontact visa centre continues in manual mode and is provided only to participants in the live queue.

id: CALL CENTER OPERATION AND FEEDBACK PROCESSING||11/03/2024
title: CALL CENTER OPERATION AND FEEDBACK PROCESSING
description: Due to technical work on the call center line, from March 11 to March 15, short-term interruptions in the connection are possible.

id: SERVICES OF TRAVEL COMPANIES||04/03/2024
title: SERVICES OF TRAVEL COMPANIES
description: On the eve of the summer season, on behalf of the Italian Embassy, TLScontact continues to cooperate with companies promoting the Italian tourism product. In case of improper informing of tourists or significant violations in the processing of visa documents, the service of the travel agency will be terminated. The number of slots allocated to travel agencies for the sale of tourist products is limited.

id: LIVE QUEUE – REGISTRATION OF NON-RESIDENTS||27/02/2024
title: LIVE QUEUE – REGISTRATION OF NON-RESIDENTS
description:
In addition to the news of 13.06.2023 about the "Live Queue" procedure, we inform you that residents of other regions (except Minsk) can make an appointment without visiting the TLScontact Visa Application Centre in person.
To do this, you should send a registered letter with a notification to the address of the visa centre:

id: PREMIUM SERVICE – ACCEPTANCE OF APPLICATIONS IN A CONSTANT MODE||27/02/2024
title: PREMIUM SERVICE – ACCEPTANCE OF APPLICATIONS IN A CONSTANT MODE
description: On the eve of the summer season, new applications for PREMIUM SERVICE will be accepted on a regular basis. To do this, please usethe feedback form"Registration for submission of documents PREMIUM SERVICE" and specify:

id: ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS AND BOOKING – SESSION 2||26/02/2024
title: ABOUT THE RELEASE OF SLOTS AND BOOKING – SESSION 2
description: Until further notice, appointments at the TLScontact Visa Application Centre will continue to be made manually and will only be available to participants in the first place.

id: APPOINTMENTS AND RESERVATIONS||05/02/2024
title: APPOINTMENTS AND RESERVATIONS
description: To counteract unscrupulous intermediaries, TLScontact is upgrading the online booking procedure. During the transition period, as a temporary measure, registration for submission will be made manually. Manual entry will only apply to live queue participants.

id: UPDATE ON SLOT RELEASE||30/01/2024
title: UPDATE ON SLOT RELEASE
description: Herewith we notify that the slots till mid-February will be prioritized in favour of organized tourism groups to Italy (Spring school vacations). Please monitor News for further updates. For special categories of applicants (business, visiting close relatives in Italy, humanitarian reasons) as well as individuals from Live Queue and Premium Service, the prior established procedures remain valid.

id: LIVE QUEUE UPDATES||29/01/2024
title: LIVE QUEUE UPDATES
description: Starting January 31st 2024, enrollment to the Live queue will be accepted daily (on the working days of Visa centre) from 11 to 12 am, and 4 to 5pm.

id: FRAUD ALERT||22/12/2023
title: FRAUD ALERT
description:
Recently, cases of presentation of fake confirmations of registration for filing have become more frequent.
We remind you that accounts must be created by applicants personally and contain reliable personal data (phone number, email address, passport number, name). We caution against contacting intermediaries who offer to organize the submission of a visa application. Visitors with fake confirmations are not accepted and TLScontact has no obligations towards them.

id: PROCESSING OF PREMIUM SERVICE REQUESTS||08/12/2023
title: PROCESSING OF PREMIUM SERVICE REQUESTS
description: On November 27-28, over 4,000 requests  were received for the Premium Service. Processing may take up to 15 business days. If you submitted your request on time and have not received a number yet, please wait until December 19th without repeated requests. Requests submitted after November 28th will not be considered.

id: SHENGEN VISAS FOR CITIZENS OF THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION||07/12/2023
title: SHENGEN VISAS FOR CITIZENS OF THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION
description: Citizens of the Russian Federation having a residence permit or temporary residence permit in the Republic of Belarus issued before 02/24/2022 (or a renewal of a residence permit issued the first time before that date) can apply for a visa through the TLScontact Visa Centre.You find more details in the“Frequently Asked Questions”and“Visa Fees”sections. Registration for submission follows the general rules.

id: VISA SYSTEM MAINTENANCE 14th December 2023||04/12/2023
title: VISA SYSTEM MAINTENANCE 14th December 2023
description:
Due to the Italian Visa processing system maintenance on 14th December 2023, the slots
    will be re-booked for the next working days.On 14th December 2023, no applications will be accepted, incl. Premium Service and Live queue. Passback and Call
    center are working as usual.We apologize for the inconvenience.

id: PREMIUM SERVICE - NEW APPLICATIONS||24/11/2023
title: PREMIUM SERVICE - NEW APPLICATIONS
description: November 27-28, 2023 only New applications for PREMIUM SERVICE are accepted.Please use the feedback formhttps://visa-it.tlscontact.com/by/msq/inquiry.php"Registration for the submission of documents PREMIUM SERVICE" and specify:1. Applicant's full name in Latin letters (in passport spelling). There can be one request per family (spouses, parents and children);2. Applicant's phone number (separate number for each adult) ;3 . The applicant's email address that will be used when registering a personal account (one per family is allowed) - see "Cybersecurity Requirements" dated 02.11.2023 ;4. Ready for submission in the 3rd decade of December 2023 and the 1st-2nd decade of January 2024.The application will be cancelled if:1. The conditions of clauses 1-3 are not fulfilled ;2. received before 27 and after 28 November ;3. is a duplicate :4. has signs of intermediary actions.Applications will be processed in chronological order.You will receive an email with a number on the waiting list; the number is assigned free of charge.Then, all other things being equal, we will first contact applicants who are ready to submit as soon as possible. You will receive an email from TLScontact to enable you to sign up for a TLScontact account. If a personal account is not created within a day (or created for another email, for a different name), your queue will be canceled.Waiting list information does not constitute confirmation of service appointments. Due to the limited capacity of slots and seats in the VIP Lounge, TLScontact does not guarantee that all accepted applications for the PREMIUM SERVICE will be serviced.Due to high number of received enquiries, processing may take up to 15 working days.

id: QUEUE STATUS FOR PREMIUM SERVICE||16/11/2023
title: QUEUE STATUS FOR PREMIUM SERVICE
description: Processing of the current queue for the Premium service (news PREMIUM SERVICE MINSK dated 08/10/2023, last queue number No. 2893) ends on November 23, 2023.If you have a number in the queue for the Premium Service, you have already received an invitation to apply, but you have not provided data to assign a slot:We invite you to create an account and report your queue number, full name and “M-number” to thecall centerbefore November 23, 2023.The remaining Premium Service slots will be confirmed for mid-December 2023 on a first-come, first-served basis.When data arrives simultaneously, priority is given to numbers in chronological order.Once the available slots are exhausted, remaining applications will be cancelled.After November 23, 2023, information from participants in the current queue will not be accepted.The possibility of a new entry into the Premium Service waiting list will be announced additionally.

id: VISITING CLOSE RELATIVES IN ITALY - Update||15/11/2023
title: VISITING CLOSE RELATIVES IN ITALY - Update
description: If you have an invitation for the close relatives (spouse, father, mother, grandfather, grandmother, children or grandchildren) from EU citizen in Italy, you can apply for a visa directly at the Embassy of Italy. If you wish to apply via TLScontact Visa centre, please follow the instructionSLOTS FOR VISITING CLOSE RELATIVES IN ITALYdated 31/05/2023.

id: Update on slot' release||09/11/2023
title: Update on slot' release
description:
Herewith we notify that the slots for the last week of November and the first week of December will be prioritized in favour of organized tourism groups to Italy. Please monitor News for further updates.
For special categories of applicants (business, visiting close relatives in Italy, humanitarian reasons) the prior established procedures remain valid.

id: CYBERSECURITY REQUIREMENTS||02/11/2023
title: CYBERSECURITY REQUIREMENTS
description: Scammers’ activity, including advertising “slot services,” creating multiple accounts, and attempting to track slots using automated software, and other ways of our website and systems abuse, continues. TLScontact reminds you of the applicable cybersecurity principles (including, but not limited to) when working with the website of the Italy Visa Application Centre in the Republic of Belarus:

id: WEBSITE MAINTENANCE||30/10/2023
title: WEBSITE MAINTENANCE
description: TLScontact is further enhancing cybersecurity measures, this requires maintenance works on our website. In some cases, users might temporarily face difficulties with creating or updating an account. Online slot release will be suspended for 48 hours. If you have questions, please send them viaFeedback & Complaint formon TLScontact website and provide details, which  issue exactly and how long you are experienced. Appreciate your understanding and cooperation.

id: DOCUMENTS' AUTHENTICITY - CLARIFICATION||18/10/2023
title: DOCUMENTS' AUTHENTICITY - CLARIFICATION
description:
Herewith we remind that all personal data from the account should fully match the
    documents during visa' application.

id: UPDATE ON CYBERSECURITY MEASURES||12/10/2023
title: UPDATE ON CYBERSECURITY MEASURES
description: Facing increasing hackers’ attempts to create false accounts and book slots, TLScontact is further enhancing cybersecurity measures.

id: PREMIUM SERVICE' QUEUE STATUS||23/08/2023
title: PREMIUM SERVICE' QUEUE STATUS
description: Processing of all requests for the Premium Service queue is completed.

id: PREMIUM SERVICE MINSK - UPDATE||10/08/2023
title: PREMIUM SERVICE MINSK - UPDATE
description: Due to the large number of requests, new applications to the waiting list suspended from August 11, 2023.

id: PREMIUM SERVICE - new applications||04/08/2023
title: PREMIUM SERVICE - new applications
description:
We resume accepting new applications for PREMIUM SERVICE.
Please use the feedback formhttps://visa-it.tlscontact.com/by/msq/inquiry.php"Register for submission of documents PREMIUM SERVICE - Minsk" and specify:

id: WALK-IN (LIVE QUEUE) MINSK - update||13/06/2023
title: WALK-IN (LIVE QUEUE) MINSK - update
description: On recommendation of the Italian Embassy, TLScontact accepts a certain number of applicants daily without an appointment (Walk-in).

id: DOCUMENTS' AUTHENTICITY - UPDATE||09/06/2023
title: DOCUMENTS' AUTHENTICITY - UPDATE
description: The number of accounts with inaccurate passport numbers has increased. If you created an account with incorrect data, you should report in writing toCustomer Servicewith the reason of contact "Data subject access request". We will enable You to modify data, before slot assignment. If an account with wrong information has an assigned slot, the change is not possible.

id: SLOTS FOR VISITING CLOSE RELATIVES IN ITALY||31/05/2023
title: SLOTS FOR VISITING CLOSE RELATIVES IN ITALY
description: Relatives are considered as close in ascending and descending lines (father, mother, grandfather, grandmother, children, grandchildren).

id: ACCOUNTS AND ONLINE SLOTS - UPDATE||31/05/2023
title: ACCOUNTS AND ONLINE SLOTS - UPDATE
description: TLScontact regularly releases online slots for standard time and Prime Time. Its volume is also matching 4-5 people (family consisting of parents and minors).

id: COMMUNICATION TOOLS AND METHODS||31/05/2023
title: COMMUNICATION TOOLS AND METHODS
description: The seasonal demand for visa services is increasing, but the slots’ limit remains unchanged and may be not sufficient for all customers.

id: APPOINTMENTS FOR THE SUBMISSION OF VISA DOCUMENTS||04/05/2023
title: APPOINTMENTS FOR THE SUBMISSION OF VISA DOCUMENTS
description: In the summer of 2023, TLScontact Visa Application Centres  are operating as usual.

id: PREMIUM SERVICE RESERVATION UPDATE (MINSK)||18/04/2023
title: PREMIUM SERVICE RESERVATION UPDATE (MINSK)
description: We process requests for PREMIUM SERVICE in chronological order. After slots for May are occupied, next requests will be arranged by serial numbers. The number in line will be communicated to the sender.

id: RESERVATIONS UPDATE IN BREST||13/04/2023
title: RESERVATIONS UPDATE IN BREST
description: We continue processing requests in Brest in chronological order. When slots become available, the next applicant in turn will receive an email with an offer. If no response, the appointment will be offered to the next in line.

id: APPOINTMENTS' PERSPECTIVE||23/03/2023
title: APPOINTMENTS' PERSPECTIVE
description: Premium Service: is booked out for April 2023; reservations for May start on April 13th, 2023.

id: Visa appointments in Brest||07/03/2023
title: Visa appointments in Brest
description:
Ahead of the summer season, TLScontact is resuming visa appointments inBrest. Please monitorNewsfor other regions.
Residents of Brest and Brest region are welcome to submit their enquiries for visa appointments.
Please create yourTLScontact accountand send via“Contact Us”form  the following information:

id: Premium service requests||07/03/2023
title: Premium service requests
description: Please be reminded, that Premium Service (VIP lounge)  is available inMinsk Visa centre. Reservations for VIP slots in April 2023 will be processed on 15th of March.

id: Call center closure||20/02/2023
title: Call center closure
description: Dear applicants, our Call-center will be closed from February 23rd to February 24th, 2023.

id: CURRENT STATUS OF APPOINTMENTS AVAILABILITY||04/01/2023
title: CURRENT STATUS OF APPOINTMENTS AVAILABILITY
description: According to bidprocedure for visa servicesTLScontact obligations should not exceed the contract duration.Thus, the slot’ release is suspended until further notice.Standard slots were already released and booked out online. The confirmed slots are valid.For EU relatives’ visits in Italy, business travel, and Premium Service requests, please useFeedback form.As demand exceeds supply dramatically, TLScontact can not guarantee satisfying all enquiries. Thank You for understanding.

id: Call center closure||22/12/2022
title: Call center closure
description: Due to the Christmas holidays, the Call center will be closed from January 1st to January 9th, 2023.

id: PRICES FOR VALUE ADDED SERVICES||29/09/2022
title: PRICES FOR VALUE ADDED SERVICES
description: Please be informed that prices for some additional services will change from October 1:

id: Rules of visiting Visa centre||18/08/2022
title: Rules of visiting Visa centre
description: Taking into account the size of the premises and the high demand for services, in order to prevent Covid-19 and ensure fire safety requirements:Only applicants are allowed to the visa centre, without accompanying persons (except for persons in need of assistance for health reasons).Children under 12 do not have to participate in the submission of documents; their documents should be presented by parents (authorized adults).Staying at the visa centre is limited by the time of submission and receiving of documents.In order to protect health, please wear a mask.While waiting, please observe the silence and the established safety rules.

id: About the rules of registration for submission of documents||19/07/2022
title: About the rules of registration for submission of documents
description: Due to the ongoing attempts of intermediaries to offer slots for the submission of documents, we inform you:The accounts and booked slots will be cancelled if made not in accordance with theTerms of Service.The procedure for applying for a visa is individual in nature and implies the performance of the necessary actions by the Applicants personally, due to the requirements for the protection of personal data of the Applicants.According to clause 2 of the Terms, “... To use any Service that will be provided by TLScontact, the Applicant must perform the following actions through the TLScontact website:

id: Important news||10/06/2022
title: Important news
description: There was a technical failure in the TLScontact booking system, the reasons for which are being investigated.

id: WHERE TO BOOK YOUR VISA APPOINTMENT||18/04/2022
title: WHERE TO BOOK YOUR VISA APPOINTMENT
description: The websites of the Italian Embassy and TLScontact are the only authorised sites to book Your appointment for an Italian visa. No intermediary is authorized to sell visa appointments. TLScontact is not managing the off-site queue for Walk-in. If You need assistance, please approach ourCustomer service.

id: Italian Embassy starts accepting applications for Schengen tourist visas||28/02/2022
title: Italian Embassy starts accepting applications for Schengen tourist visas
description: From March 1, 2022, the Italian Embassy in Minsk will start accepting and processing applications for Schengen tourist visas. You can submit the documents through TLScontact Visa Application Centre.

id: IMPORTANT||17/09/2020
title: IMPORTANT
description: Until an unspecified date the Embassy of Italy in Minsk can accept and process applications for a Schengen visa for tourism purposes only for the following categories of applicants:

id: CHANGING OF THE VISA FEE FOR A SCHENGEN VISA||30/06/2020
title: CHANGING OF THE VISA FEE FOR A SCHENGEN VISA
description: From July 1, 2020, due to the Agreement between the EU and Belarus on visa facilitation, the fee for a Short Term Schengen visa reduces from 80 to 35 euro. For more details, please clickhere.

id: CORONAVIRUS||
title: CORONAVIRUS
description: VisitWHO websitefor more information.

id: Prime Time Appointment||
title: Prime Time Appointment
description: Please do not select Prime Time Appointments if you don’t agree to use the service.
